mcq.statement: Choose the nearest Indirect Speech sentence: They said, "It was raining heavily, when they came out of the theatre"?

options.a: They said that it was raining heavily, when they had come out of the theatre
options.b: They said that it had been raining heavily, when they came out of the theatre
options.c: They said that it rained when they had come out of the theatre
options.d: They said that it had been raining heavily, when they had come out of the theatre
